title: Code of the Clans
description:
The secrets behind the warrior code will finally be revealed.An ominous sign from StarClan that signaled the need to patrol bordersThe unexpected help from a warrior ancestor that cemented the importance of eldersA secret coup that led to a deputy's new roleA medicine cat's pleas that stopped a spree of interClan bloodshed 
And many more never-before-told stories!
author: Erin Hunter
